verses.verse: I am sought<WH1875> of them that asked<WH7592> not<WH3808> for me; I am found<WH4672> of them that sought<WH1245> me not<WH3808>: I said<WH559>, Behold me, behold me, unto a nation<WH1471> that was not called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>.

I have spread out<WH6566> my hands<WH3027> all the day<WH3117> unto a rebellious<WH5637> people<WH5971>, which walketh<WH1980> in a way<WH1870> that was not good<WH2896>, after<WH310> their own thoughts<WH4284>;

A people<WH5971> that provoketh me to anger<WH3707> continually<WH8548> to my face<WH6440>; that sacrificeth<WH2076> in gardens<WH1593>, and burneth incense<WH6999> upon altars of brick<WH3843>; upon: Heb. upon bricks

Which remain<WH3427> among the graves<WH6913>, and lodge<WH3885> in the monuments<WH5341>, which eat<WH398> swine's<WH2386> flesh<WH1320>, and broth<WH4839> <WH6564> of abominable<WH6292> things is in their vessels<WH3627>; broth: or, pieces

Which say<WH559>, Stand<WH7126> by thyself, come not near<WH5066> to me; for I am holier<WH6942> than thou. These are a smoke<WH6227> in my nose<WH639>, a fire<WH784> that burneth<WH3344> all the day<WH3117>. nose: or, anger
Behold, it is written<WH3789> before<WH6440> me: I will not keep silence<WH2814>, but will recompense<WH7999>, even recompense<WH7999> into their bosom<WH2436>,

Your iniquities<WH5771>, and the iniquities<WH5771> of your fathers<WH1> together<WH3162>, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>, which have burned incense<WH6999> upon the mountains<WH2022>, and blasphemed<WH2778> me upon the hills<WH1389>: therefore will I measure<WH4058> their former<WH7223> work<WH6468> into their bosom<WH2436>.

Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>, As the new wine<WH8492> is found<WH4672> in the cluster<WH811>, and one saith<WH559>, Destroy<WH7843> it not; for a blessing<WH1293> is in it: so will I do<WH6213> for my servants'<WH5650> sakes, that I may not destroy<WH7843> them all.

And I will bring forth<WH3318> a seed<WH2233> out of Jacob<WH3290>, and out of Judah<WH3063> an inheritor<WH3423> of my mountains<WH2022>: and mine elect<WH972> shall inherit<WH3423> it, and my servants<WH5650> shall dwell<WH7931> there.

And Sharon<WH8289> shall be a fold<WH5116> of flocks<WH6629>, and the valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911> a place for the herds<WH1241> to lie down in<WH7258>, for my people<WH5971> that have sought<WH1875> me.

But ye are they that forsake<WH5800> the LORD<WH3068>, that forget<WH7913> my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>, that prepare<WH6186> a table<WH7979> for that troop<WH1409> <WH1408>, and that furnish<WH4390> the drink offering<WH4469> unto that number<WH4507>. troop: or, Gad number: or, Meni, a pagan god

Therefore will I number<WH4487> you to the sword<WH2719>, and ye shall all bow down<WH3766> to the slaughter<WH2874>: because when I called<WH7121>, ye did not answer<WH6030>; when I spake<WH1696>, ye did not hear<WH8085>; but did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> before mine eyes<WH5869>, and did choose<WH977> that wherein I delighted<WH2654> not.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, Behold, my servants<WH5650> shall eat<WH398>, but ye shall be hungry<WH7456>: behold, my servants<WH5650> shall drink<WH8354>, but ye shall be thirsty<WH6770>: behold, my servants<WH5650> shall rejoice<WH8055>, but ye shall be ashamed<WH954>:

Behold, my servants<WH5650> shall sing<WH7442> for joy<WH2898> of heart<WH3820>, but ye shall cry<WH6817> for sorrow<WH3511> of heart<WH3820>, and shall howl<WH3213> for vexation<WH7667> of spirit<WH7307>. vexation: Heb. breaking

And ye shall leave<WH3240> your name<WH8034> for a curse<WH7621> unto my chosen<WH972>: for the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> shall slay<WH4191> thee, and call<WH7121> his servants<WH5650> by another<WH312> name<WH8034>:

That he who blesseth<WH1288> himself in the earth<WH776> shall bless<WH1288> himself in the God<WH430> of truth<WH543>; and he that sweareth<WH7650> in the earth<WH776> shall swear<WH7650> by the God<WH430> of truth<WH543>; because the former<WH7223> troubles<WH6869> are forgotten<WH7911>, and because they are hid<WH5641> from mine eyes<WH5869>.

For, behold, I create<WH1254> new<WH2319> heavens<WH8064> and a new<WH2319> earth<WH776>: and the former<WH7223> shall not be remembered<WH2142>, nor come<WH5927> into mind<WH3820>. come: Heb. come upon the heart
But be ye glad<WH7797> and rejoice<WH1523> for ever<WH5703> in that which I create<WH1254>: for, behold, I create<WH1254> Jerusalem<WH3389> a rejoicing<WH1525>, and her people<WH5971> a joy<WH4885>.

And I will rejoice<WH1523> in Jerusalem<WH3389>, and joy<WH7797> in my people<WH5971>: and the voice<WH6963> of weeping<WH1065> shall be no more heard<WH8085> in her, nor the voice<WH6963> of crying<WH2201>.

There shall be no more thence an infant<WH5764> of days<WH3117>, nor an old man<WH2205> that hath not filled<WH4390> his days<WH3117>: for the child<WH5288> shall die<WH4191> an hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>; but the sinner<WH2398> being an hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> shall be accursed<WH7043>.
And they shall build<WH1129> houses<WH1004>, and inhabit<WH3427> them; and they shall plant<WH5193> vineyards<WH3754>, and eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of them.

They shall not build<WH1129>, and another<WH312> inhabit<WH3427>; they shall not plant<WH5193>, and another<WH312> eat<WH398>: for as the days<WH3117> of a tree<WH6086> are the days<WH3117> of my people<WH5971>, and mine elect<WH972> shall long enjoy<WH1086> the work<WH4639> of their hands<WH3027>. shall long: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out

They shall not labour<WH3021> in vain<WH7385>, nor bring forth<WH3205> for trouble<WH928>; for they are the seed<WH2233> of the blessed<WH1288> of the LORD<WH3068>, and their offspring<WH6631> with them.
And it shall come to pass, that before they call<WH7121>, I will answer<WH6030>; and while they are yet speaking<WH1696>, I will hear<WH8085>.

The wolf<WH2061> and the lamb<WH2924> shall feed<WH7462> together<WH259>, and the lion<WH738> shall eat<WH398> straw<WH8401> like the bullock<WH1241>: and dust<WH6083> shall be the serpent's<WH5175> meat<WH3899>. They shall not hurt<WH7489> nor destroy<WH7843> in all my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>.
